basics.name: Zan Thrash
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary: Driven software developer with over 15 years experience building web applications.

work.summary: Principal Full Stack Engineer for Target Supply Chain. Developing the control plane for insight and analytics for Targets next generation supply chain management systems.
Full Stack Engineer for the Netflix Delivery Engineering Tools team. Developing Spinnaker, the next generation multi-cloud Continuous Delivery platform for Netflix and the OSS community.
highlights: Developed Web based UI to allow internal teams to continually deliver software accross mulitlpe AWS regions and and accounts with minimal effort on the end users part.
Built out multiple backend microservices to provide integration points for Spinnaker to many of Netflix's internal services.
Collaborate closely with internal customers on a daily basis to make their jobs easier and provide them with the tools to deliver code faster.
Work closely with external teams(Google, Microsoft, Pivital) to help them get Spinnaker working with their cloud offerings.
Built multiple command line tools in Go to assist in troubleshooting production issues in a microservices architecture.
Open Sourced Spinnaker in November 2015 ( http://spinnaker.io ).

work.summary: Principal Consultant with a focus in Grails/Spring/AngularJS
highlights: Helped establish and grow Grails business in a well established JEE / Spring consultancy.
Co-authored Grails training course
Established Annual Hackathon
Speaker: Gr8Conf US / MidwestJS /  GroovyMN / AngularMN

work.summary: Led development team in getting new products to market while helping existing products scale as the product rolls out accross the United States.
highlights: After helping build out he initial product, I was brought back to help make the suite of applications production worthy and scalable.
Worked closely with in-house development team to help bring the stakeholder's vision and desires to reality in a timely manor and on budget.
Converted client's admistrative application form a Grails/GSP to a AngularJS frontend and Grails based RESTful backend system.

work.summary: Led a small development team to bring to market the product owner's vision to change the way Buyers and Sellers interacted with each other during the home buying process.
highlights: Responsible for full lifecycle of the development, from application architecture, database design, developer testing, and coding
Built with: Grails, MySql, ActiveMQ, AWS

work.summary: Led development team in getting the initial product to market.
highlights: Led developemet effort for the backend Provider app. This application allows the nurse practitioner to review a patients case and appropriately treat the case.
The application also handles patient billing, insurance submittion, and adhears to PCI and PCH compliance.
Built with: Grails, MSSQL, ActiveMQ, AWS.

work.summary: Internationalized entire Pearson Vue code base
highlights: Worked on a small team to internationalze entire code base to get ready for large Arabic language driver testing contract.
Used Groovy to script out the string extraction and property replacent.

work.summary: Independant Grails developer for a small Grails consultancy.
highlights: Worked on multiple project for external clinets as well as for internal projects.
Projects insculed: LeanTo(leanto.com), CloudProfile.com(rebranded to ReachLocal.com), Empathic Clinical Suite(empathic.com).

work.position: Senior Java Developer - Office of Enterprise Technology
work.summary: Responsible for the maintenance and development of all applications that are used accross all campases by faculity, students and staff.
